title: Knitted Dolls
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Waaah, the knitted doll you made is so cute, Ayumu-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, thank you. It matches the one that person has.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That must be nice, a handmade knitted doll, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Are you interested in them, Hanayo-chan? I was just thinking of going to a crafts store later, so if you’d like, how about making one with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Can I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course. Then, let’s go shopping together after this. They sell knitted doll kits, and I also want to make a matching pair with you, Hanayo-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m so happy! I wonder what I should make.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>A bunny one or a chick one would be cute, right? Once you get used to it, you should be able to make other designs of your own.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Th-, then, can I also make an onigiri one!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, I think you can. Alright, let’s buy some materials that we can use to make an onigiri knitted doll.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
